title: Thenpandi Tamile En Singara Kuyile Song Lyrics Paasa Paravaigal
stanzas:
<div>
Thenpandi Tamile En Singara Kuyile Song From Paasa Paravaigal Tamil Movie composed by  Ilaiyaraaja.  This song has beautiful lyrics and shows love between brother and sister, how they both care for each other.

Thenpandi Tamile En Singara Kuyile Lyrics is written by Gangai Amaran and the song is sung by KJ Yesudas and KS Chitra.
Thenpandi Tamile En Singara Kuyile Lyrics in Thanglish thenpandi tamile en singara kuyile
thenpandi tamile en singara kuyile
isai paadum oru kaaviyam
idhu ravi varmavin oviyam
paasam enum aalayam
unaip paada vendum aayiram

thenpandi tamile en singara kuyile
thenpandi tamile en singara kuyile

vaazhthi unnai paadave
vaarthai thondravillaiye.
paarthu paarthu kannile
paasam maara villaiye

anbu enum koondile
aadip paadum poonguyil
aasai dheepam yettruthe
annan unnaip pottruthe

thaayai pola paarkkiren
veru paarvai illaiye
manjalodu kungumam
kondu vaazha vendume
nee endrum vaazha vendume

dhegam veru aagalaam
jeevan ondru thaanamma
anbu kondu paadidum
annan ennai paramma
kovil thevai illaiye
naalum vaazhum dheivame

koodi vaazhum kuruvigal
paadum paasa paravaigal (2)

vaazhthuven unai potruven
vaazhvellaam unai yetruven

kaalam kaalam yaavilum
sernthu vaazha vendume
naam sernthu vaazha vendume
